website_summaries.verdict: No fluff, no problem. This basic DS game card case does what it's made to do: organize and protect your games.
pros: Small and compact, but holds a fair amount of games for its size
Durable and keeps games locked in place as you flip through them
cons: Nothing fancy or concealing about the case
While getting the games in is easy, removing them may be difficult for a child

customer_reviews.title: 22 game cards not 24
customer_reviews.text: Like the case but the advertising up front in misleading. It has 22 slots for game cards and 2 for sd card. Shame on me for not driving all the way down to the bottom of the description I guess but... Idk change the number it the title to 22 it's not that hard. I specifically got this one because I thought it was just for games. Over all though the quality is nice, the game cards fit securely and it's nice to have everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Nice

customer_reviews.title: Good- feeling case
customer_reviews.text: You could make an ASMR video with this case. When you fill it with games it has a fantastic tactile feeling while flipping through. Feels sturdy and made to last. Games snap in very securely and are very easy to take out. 3DS games can go anywhere, but only go upside-down on the right side of any "page" but it doesn't bother me. You can fit 22 games and 2 SD cards.
customer_reviews.author: Marija Heibel

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Tight a Fit for 3DS Cartridges
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this as it is simple, offers good visibility, and doesn't have 60+ game slots that I just don't need. However, some of the game slots are just way too tight – not all, but at least 75% were. It was difficult to get some games to go in, and even harder to then get them out (to the point where it required so much force that I was worried I might break one). I will say that per usual, Amazon was awesome about the return process, and made it easy to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. I got it so I can keep it in my 3ds xl case where the 3ds is supposed to go, since I keep an actual case on my ds. (for anybody wondering the case is a dreamgear comfort grip, from amazon. Super cool). It’s hard to take the games out of the case but I guess you’d expect that so that it can keep them in snug so they won’t fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Nice for storing the precarious pile of cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: We had cartridges piled all over the bookcase earlier, and now they're safely in one place, not in danger of falling onto the floor. Easy to click the cartridges into the case. If the cartridge doesn't seem to be clicking in easily, look at the little imprint to see which direction the cartridge should be facing, it varies per slot.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great product modeled after a Nintendo 3DS case we already have. Unfortunately, this is far from the official Nintendo case it’s modeled after. As an adult, it’s incredibly difficult to open the case and, when you do manage to open it, it’s very hard to get the game cartridges out of it. My 10 year old couldn’t open it at all. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Only 22 Slots for Cartridges
customer_reviews.text: The case only has 22 slots for games, not 24 as advertised. Seems to be made well enough, but I don't need the SD card storage and I DO need 24 slots for the cartridges. Not worth returning, but annoyed nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Allison T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Rigid
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is rigid and not especially easy to insert or remove game cartridges because the plastic isn't very flexible. Maybe it's just a matter of getting used to precisely where to apply force. The hinges are folded plastic so bending back and forth too many times will probably eventually break the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow21

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: It is more or less what I wanted but it would have been nicer if it had clear instructions about how to put the cartridges in. I initially had a hard time putting them in and thought that maybe my product was bad. It also would have been better if maybe it was a little softer but that’s just a preference.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: A little odd but it works.
customer_reviews.text: The case does fit 3ds and ds games, but for 3ds games you have to fit the little notch in the catridge to the notch in the case. Otherwise the case is really good and sturdy, and its easy to see all my games and see which one I'm looking for. 2 Spaces are for SD cards so you have 22 game spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and simple.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and simple. Mostly 3ds a few regular ds and 2 sd card slots. Wish it was clearer about just exactly what it held but pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Game Case for 3DS
customer_reviews.text: I like how many games you can fit into these cases and how simple and compact the case is. There's no childish look to these cases, so they're nicer for more adult collectors. But simple enough for kids too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck, hard to be
customer_reviews.text: The games fit well. And it's sturdy enough that I don't worry about tossing it in a backpack. If I was going to nitpick it would be nice if it felt a tad sturdier. But for the price it's really hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: scott loving

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to put the games in and take them out. The games are secure once they are in. I don’t feel like I have to force the games into their spot. The plastic is nice and sturdy. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Not for 3DS games, will only fit DS games
customer_reviews.text: this says for 3ds specifically? I thought I messed up and didn’t realize this would only hold DS games, but it turns out that the seller messed up and mislabeled the thing. 3ds games have like a little extra thing jutting out whereas DS games are square, so 3ds games won’t fit in here. One star bc this is literally not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price !
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • For the price point it is 100% worth it • Fits both 3DS & DS Games ! • Not to bulky or to big Cons • That spot you see that's empty, I can't fit anything there ? So I wonder if Its just supposed to be empty or, I'm just doing it wrong. ( ONLY reason I gave it 4☆ )
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Three total slots are made for only SD cards???? Makes no sense but I don’t have enough games for it to be a problem. Fits both DS and 3DS games but only in particular places. Not universal.
customer_reviews.author: Toria Olson

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! So simple but necessary! Cuts down on the clutter of game boxes! Small enough to fit in a pocket or bag but can hold so much!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have any branding that I can see, the case feels solid, and it protects my games at a low price. Not much else to ask for.
customer_reviews.author: grumble

customer_reviews.title: To keep my games safe
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it out yet but, I do hope they fit as well as keep all of my games safe!
customer_reviews.author: Magüis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, must have for mobility.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with my games, allowing me to carry them around with me without having to hold all the cases as well. Holds my 3ds and regular ds cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Meems

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but not all slots can be utilized for games.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful but you cant actually put games in where the SD card slots are, so you cant hold a full 24 games.
customer_reviews.author: GPoyns

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, small flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great little holder to keep games from getting lost... there an issue in the corners they don’t hold 3ds games but old the older ones so no biggy
customer_reviews.author: 123_abc

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift. My grandson said he could definitely use it and seemed pleased by it.
customer_reviews.author: GGMarceaux

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I hate that they staggered the orientation so some are right side up and some are upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was for switch games at first. But it was still a good value and a great looking product. I gave it to my daughter for her ds games.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for storing games
customer_reviews.text: Small yet exactly what we needed. Stores up to 24 games in a clear and compact case.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Fits Fine
customer_reviews.text: This was sturdy and fit games fine. I didn’t expect it to do much else so five stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Allen

customer_reviews.title: Must have to consolidate your games
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe this is such a help to get the games in on container. I used to put it on my DS bag but the weight is annoying. This case makes my life easier to bring all the games with me on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fitable case for your 3(ds) videgames.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set case for 3(ds) games. BEWARE! A tad smaller than other cases.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome! It easily holds both my ds and 3ds games.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that it says you can hold 24 games when in reality it can only hold 22, its great! Thank goodness I don't have more than 22 games. It matches my 3ds (I got the blue one) and it hasn't broken, Ive had it for a while too. So Im glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap. It's durable. You can fit 22 games and 2 SD cards in it. Not exactly pretty and sometimes it is hard to get the games out (but at least they don't fall out). Worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: It gets used
customer_reviews.text: My kids a generally against organization but they actual use this. Seems decent enough quality.
customer_reviews.author: theWicked

customer_reviews.title: Not flashy, but solid product
customer_reviews.text: Decent case. Simple but does the job well. Kids have dropped a few times, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: roland scott garza

customer_reviews.title: Good case, does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: This case is small which I appreciate so it easily able to be carried around. Easy to take games out and to put them in. Slots for SD cards as well. Many slots for lots of games in such a tiny space which I love. And it also fits other games like DSI Games to. Overall a good case.
customer_reviews.author: 🅱️yndseyyy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the used no case included games from resellers on Amazon lol
customer_reviews.author: xl33tgamerx

customer_reviews.title: It's a working case
customer_reviews.text: Games snap in a bit tight, but overall very good so far
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality, false information in title.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, cheaply made, unhappy that the cartridge slots are upside on the right columns AND this holds 2 memory cards, so it only holds 22 games, not 24. CHANGE THE TITLE! Add an image of how games are inserted!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: great organizer for games but 2 of the 24 slots are for sd cards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case for 3ds games
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with this product. Games stay securely fit. Was a little disappointed with the fact that it only held 22 games instead of 24 but might smooth out the SD slots to gain the extra 2 spots. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great case to hold 3ds and ds games!
customer_reviews.text: This case is very sturdy and seems like it would last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jaws Whoop

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my extra 3DS / DS cartridges. It serves it's purpose well, but sometimes it really tough to get them out of their slots. Can use the space they provide for SD cards for games either. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: MoxieMadness

customer_reviews.title: Holds A Lot
customer_reviews.text: Good little case. Nice blue color. Description is accurate. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have all my games in it, love the size and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the games won’t click in that easily, but for the price and shipping time it was worth it. I love the color too
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great, 2 of the slots are for memory cards but still an awesome little container that keeps games together so as to not lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Games didn’t fit inside for my 3DS and kept popping out. The booklet itself also kept popping out. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yamile stitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small collection
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It displays my Ds/3ds Pokémon games collection perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Fits games well
customer_reviews.text: Fits my games snugly. It arrived packaged very well to avoid damage during shipping, amd over all, I am pretty satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Braatz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Did the work. Doesn’t break, shame there are 2 memory card slots instead of one
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and keeps games in their place. I haven’t had any trouble with games falling out or being loose at all!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 22 games and 2 useless memory card holders
customer_reviews.text: The design is simple and the price is great but why they put memory card slots is a mystery to me.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational tool!
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my son’s games neat and he knows where to find the game he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Too tight to fit games
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. Couldn’t fit any of my DS/3DS games in it. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Game case for DS/3DS
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have THE case for my 3DS/DS games. I had purchased a case from a certain major game provider and none of my games fit. This case, on the other hand, is perfect. My games fit smoothly and come out easily. They stay in the slots for each game. This case does exactly what you need: it holds your DS/3DS games snugly. Some people indicated that the case doesn't fit 3DS games in all the slots, but that's not correct. Games for the 3DS fit in all spots in the case. Well done Amazon basics on another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Protect your games! Highly recommended?
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all the games for the 2 ds. It holds 22 games plus 2 sd cards. Now I have a place for all my games. It feels like it will hold up to alot of use.
customer_reviews.author: DWeaver

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Nintendo 3DS Game Card Storage Case Holder with 24 Cartridge Slots - 3 x 5 x 1 Inches, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackLarge capacity yet compact design game case is compatible for both the Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS game cards. It can store up to 22 game cards and two SD or SDHC memory cards.
Case is available in 3 colors: Black
Note: Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS games not included.
feature_bullets: Game storage case for the following types of Nintendo game cartridges: New 2DS XL, New 3DS XL, 2DS, and 3DS
Easily store and organize up to 24 Nintendo game cards; includes slots for 2 SD cards
Handy cartridge holders allow for easily slipping game cards in and out
Compact, space-saving size; protects games when not in use; offers convenient portability
Stylish design in sleek black color; backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars630 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
